arts.ttl: Grealish debuts for Everton in loss at promoted Leeds in Premier League
arts.sum: Grealish entered in the 71st minute when the score was 0-0 at Elland Road and struggled to make an impact before Leeds was awarded a penalty when Everton captain James Tarkowski blocked a goal-bound shot with his left arm as he leaned his body toward the ball. Everton manager David Moyes was unhappy at the awarding of the penalty, saying “it wasn’t fair” because Tarkowski’s arm wasn’t in an unnatural position.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke hails Lukas Nmecha’s ‘ice-cold finish’ in Leeds’ win over Everton
arts.sum: The summer signing, a free transfer from Wolfsburg, held his nerve to bury his 84th-minute spot kick.

arts.ttl: Leeds United 1-0 Everton: Post-Match Leeds United Player Ratings
arts.sum: Stach was fantastic offensively and defensively similar to Tanaka, he was winning the ball back, 4 defensive recoveries, 5 clearances when Leeds were under pressure, all whilst being the most creative player in the match, creating 4 chances for his teammates. Defensively no other player won as many duels as Gudmundsson, winning 7 in the match accompanied with 4 clearances and 2 interceptions.

arts.ttl: Leeds United 1-0 Everton: Everton Player ratings
arts.sum: The Senegalse blazed a shot well over the bar in the second-half and broke up play on numerous occasions but struggled to get on the ball and build Everton out of dealing with the pressure that was thrown at them. The game was settled by a contentious penalty decision as James Tarkowski was penalised for handball, which was then dispatched by Nmecha to break the deadlock to hand Leeds the three points.

arts.ttl: Leeds United vs Everton penalty decision explained by VAR rules ‘expert’
arts.sum: All the pre-season preparations paid off for Leeds United in their win against Everton on Monday night. The Whites became the second newly promoted team this gameweek to record a win. Sunderland recorded a shock win as they beat West Ham 3-0 at home. arts.ttl: Everton defender James Tarkowski slams officials after Leeds United penalty decision
arts.sum: It is quite a rare occurrence for newly promoted clubs to win their opener in the Premier League, but Leeds United did. They followed the lead of fellow promoted club Sunderland from this weekend. Going into the game, all the talk was about Daniel Farke and him asking for quality in attack for this season. arts.ttl: Three things Daniel Farke got right as Leeds United beat Everton 1-0, new signing catches the eye
Elland Road erupts as Leeds United beat Everton on Premier League return
arts.sum: An electric Elland Road erupts on Monday night as debutant Lukas Nmecha strikes a late penalty to seal Leeds United’s winning return to the Premier League against Everton.

arts.ttl: Sky Sports and BBC pundits respond to Everton vs Leeds controversy: 'A scandal'
arts.sum: Leeds United claimed victory in their opening Premier League match of the season as they beat Everton 1-0 at Elland Road thanks to Lukas Nmecha's controversial late penalty

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke said he’s secured one of his ‘dream signings’ for Leeds United amid Everton win
arts.sum: Daniel Farke was singing the praises of one of his new signings before the Everton game in the Premier League on Monday night. Leeds were...
